mapper.select: SELECT A.STU_NUM, A.STU_PHOTO, STU_NM_KOR FROM STUDENT A, ( SELECT STU_NUM, S_NUM FROM STUDY WHERE S_GRADE = 0 OR S_GRADE = 1) B WHERE B.S_NUM = #{data} AND A.STU_NUM = B.STU_NUM
SELECT A.TIME_TCODE FROM LECTURE_TM A, ( SELECT SBJ_NUM AS SBJ_NUM FROM COURSE_LIST WHERE STU_NUM = #{data} AND CL_SEMESTER = '2023-01') B WHERE A.SBJ_NUM = B.SBJ_NUM

SELECT C.TIME_TCODE, D.SBJ_TITLE FROM ( SELECT A.TIME_TCODE, B.SBJ_NUM FROM LECTURE_TM A, ( SELECT SBJ_NUM AS SBJ_NUM FROM COURSE_LIST WHERE STU_NUM = #{data} AND CL_SEMESTER = '2023-01') B WHERE A.SBJ_NUM = B.SBJ_NUM) C, SUBJECT D WHERE C.SBJ_NUM = D.SBJ_NUM

SELECT C.TIME_TCODE, D.SBJ_TITLE , COUNT(C.TIME_TCODE) FROM ( SELECT A.TIME_TCODE, B.SBJ_NUM FROM LECTURE_TM A, ( SELECT SBJ_NUM FROM COURSE_LIST WHERE CL_SEMESTER = '2023-01') B WHERE A.SBJ_NUM = B.SBJ_NUM) C, SUBJECT D
WHERE C.SBJ_NUM = D.SBJ_NUM AND D.TEA_NUM = #{data} GROUP BY (C.TIME_TCODE, D.SBJ_TITLE) ORDER BY D.SBJ_TITLE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOTE(VOTE_NUM, VOTE_TITLE, VOTE_ENDDT, VOTE_ADMIN, S_NUM, PERIOD) VALUES(#{voteNum}, #{voteTitle}, #{voteEnddt}, #{voteAdmin}, #{sNum}, #{period})
mapper.select: SELECT A.VOTE_NUM, A.VOTE_TITLE, TO_CHAR(A.VOTE_ENDDT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS VOTE_ENDDT, A.VOTE_ADMIN, A.S_NUM, A.PERIOD, U.* FROM VOTE A,(SELECT B.VOTERS_NUM, B.VOTE_NUM, B.VOTERS_STU, B.VOTE_ANS, C.STU_NM_KOR, C.STU_PHOTO FROM VOTERS B, STUDENT C WHERE B.VOTERS_STU = C.STU_NUM)U WHERE A.S_NUM = #{data} AND A.VOTE_NUM = U.VOTE_NUM ORDER BY A.VOTE_ENDDT DESC

SELECT NVL((100 - A.RATE), 0) AS yes, NVL(A.RATE, 0) AS no, NVL(B.RATE, 0) AS participation, C.VOTE_ANS, D.VOTE_ADMIN FROM (SELECT ROUND(AVG(VOTE_ANS -1) * 100) AS RATE FROM (SELECT * FROM VOTERS WHERE VOTE_NUM = #{voteNum} AND VOTE_ANS IN (1,2) ) ) A, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(VOTE) * 100) AS RATE FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN VOTE_ANS = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS VOTE FROM VOTERS WHERE VOTE_NUM = #{voteNum}) ) B, (SELECT VOTE_ANS FROM VOTERS WHERE VOTERS_STU = #{votersStu} AND VOTE_NUM = #{voteNum}) C, (SELECT VOTE_ADMIN FROM VOTE WHERE VOTE_NUM = #{voteNum}) D
SELECT S.* FROM (SELECT S_NM AS TITLE FROM STUDY WHERE STU_NUM = #{data} ORDER BY S_DT DESC) S WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4
